task.title: Starting a defined meeting
task.shortdesc: You can start a meeting that is already created through the menu option.

context.p: From the menu option, you can see meetings that you are the owner and a member. You can only start meetings for those that you are the owner.
The call feature available with a chat partner also allows you to initiate a meeting with your chat partner or a group.

step.cmd: lick the menu icon ( ) next to your name and select Meetings.
Click Sametime Meetings to open HCL Sametime Meetings in a new browser tab.
You can start a meeting that is in your My Meetings list, create a new meeting, or start an instant meeting.

choices.choice: To start an existing meeting, click the name of the meeting.
To create a new meeting, click Get Started Create a new meeting .
To start an instant meeting, click Get Started Start an instant meeting .

step.info: In the Start/Join a meeting input box, enter the meeting name and click START.

info.note: Click Generate meeting name to auto-generate a meeting name.
